name: Kremling Krushin
summary: Kremling Krushin was an online Flash game released to promote the Game Boy Color release of Donkey Kong Country. It could be played on the game's official website, which is currently no longer in use by Nintendo.

name: KryptCrawler
summary:
KryptCrawler brings classic first person, grid based Dungeon Crawler gameplay to Virtual Reality.

Descend into the unknown and explore the perilous depth of the sinister tombs and crypts you are thrown into, armed with nothing but a map and your wits. Find powerful weapons and wield mighty artifacts to fight off the undead remains of the warriors who have come here before you. Defend yourself against poisonous scorpions, hungry spiders and other creatures of the dark.

KryptCrawler delivers a combination of turn based old school gameplay and real time combat and trap evasion unprecedented in its genre. Combined with the immersion of modern VR technology, you will experience dungeons like never before. Let’s just hope you make it back to sunlight and the world of the living – there are many rumors of simple-hearted adventurers who have set foot into the abyss of the crypt and never have been heard of again!

name: Krai Mira: Extended Cut
summary: Krai Mira: Extended Cut is a post-apocalyptic RPG that takes place on radioactive wastelands of the same-named island. Get the weapon you are most fit for, find comrades-in-arms, explore the island to find out the truth, and punish those who ravaged your world.

name: Kryh Explorer
summary: Explore the world of the crystal-mining creatures, the Kryh, Meet other alien races, improve your equipments and customize your burrow. Great adventures are waiting in Kryh Explorer!

name: Kronii is Hungry
summary: Kronii is Hungry is a fanmade visual novel featuring sixteen hololive members, in which you can interact with them, present them with items, take lessons to increase your status, and more.

name: Krysolov
summary: A post-apocalyptic atmospheric experience. Scavenge what you can and get out. But you are not alone. Be fast before the creature finds you a prey.

name: K-Razy Antiks
summary:
CBS Software produced this game for Atari home computers, among others.

The player controls a white ant, who must infiltrate an enemy ant hill to defeat the other 3 ants. The player and enemy ants have the ability to lay eggs, and if they are killed, they will rehatch with a new egg. If the player is killed when no viable egg is available, it is game over. The goal is to have all 3 enemy ants killed by environmental dangers, while also eliminating the eggs they lay, so that they don't respawn. Dangers include flooding, which will kill all ants at the bottom of the screen, and an anteater which will eat all creatures he can get his tongue on. When an enemy ant dies without an egg on the screen, they are placed in the ant trap in the center of the screen. When all 3 ants are eliminated, the player moves on to a more difficult level. There are 6 different mazes available. The player starts with 40 eggs, and receives bonus points after each stage depending on how many eggs they have remaining

name: Krinkle Krusher
summary:
Krinkle Krusher is an action castle defense game where you cast elemental spells to defend your kingdom from twisted and hungry creatures called Krinkles.
After several generations of peace, they happen to come back exactly when the Ancient Tree bears its first fruits in centuries, and of course a cake was made from it.

name: Krispee Street
summary: Based on the popular webcomic, this emotional (in a good way!) hidden object game features hundreds of quirky characters and items to seek and find. Jump into the quirky, curious, and feels-like-a-warm-hug world of Krispee, the webcomic. Sure to make you laugh, smile, and maybe even cry — but just a little bit! — Krispee Street is all the feels you never knew you needed.

name: Kronno Zomber
summary:
Ready for the race of your life? Become Kronno Zomber and… Run! Jump! Dodge!
But most importantly, don’t let the ferocious horde catch you!

A T-Rex riding a motorbike?
A flying dog shooting missiles?
A flying skateboard?

name: Kritika: The White Knights
summary: Kritika: The White Knights is a 3D dungeon crawler action RPG developed by ALL-M and FunFlow and published by GAMEVIL, the publishers of Darkness Reborn and Million Arthur. Play through hundreds of levels featuring various environments, monsters, and bosses. Choose one of eight unique classes that differ in abilities, playstyle, and more. Defeat your foes with a fast-paced, action-oriented combat system with simple controls and the ability to knock down and juggle enemies. Experience the action with high quality, anime-inspired graphics and combine and enhance equipment when you’re not in battle. Survive in four distinctive survival modes and face other players in three PVP modes. Customize your characters with a huge variety in Avatar items and join the battle in Kritika: The White Knights today.

name: Krut: The Mythic Wings
summary: Krut: The Mythic Wings is a fast-paced hack and slash, side-scrolling platformer based on a 2018 Thai CG animated feature-length film "Krut: The Himmaphan Warriors", following the adventure of a Garuda warrior on the enchanted Island, Himmaphan.

name: Kruger 2
summary: Kruger's journey continues on mystery island full of enemies and dangerous creatures. This time though, Kruger has got a sword that protects him from enemies in the desert, cave or in mystic forest.

name: Kramer Hentai Adventure 3
summary: Cosmo Kramer's Christmas Hentai Adventure. A labor of love. Kramer takes a Christmas sh*t.

name: Kriegsfront Tactics
summary: Kriegsfront Tactics is a procedural turn-based mecha tactics RPG set in alternate 1970s during an era of conflict in Southeast Asia where you'll play as a commander of a mecha squad sent behind enemy lines. Build your mecha squad, complete missions, and survive the front another day.

name: KreatureKind
summary: KreatureKind is an approachable and wholesome Card Battler/Deck Builder game about helping monsters, rather than killing them.

name: Krakatoa
summary:
There are several thing you must do in this game. Your general
objective is to keep everybody and everything safe from the
volcano and the periodical air strikes. And the submarine.

Starting on the left hand side of the playing area, the first
island is your base. This is where you start from, and if your
helicopter gets damaged, landing here will repair it. You can
also refuel from here as well. Should you also rescue any
people, this is where you must drop them of to gain the points.
Rescuing is done by lowering the rope and flying the end of it
into the men. Depending on how much rope you lower, you can
carry up to 5 people at once. When dropping them off, be careful
that you just lower the bottom person on the rope to level with
the ground - they will automatically climb off. If you go down
too low you will kill them.

name: Krystals with A K
summary: A relaxing construction game about mining an industrial quantity of crystal gems. Use those gems to build new buildings and combine those gems to unlock even more buildings. These new buildings will increase your production and the complexity of your ever growing factory.

name: Krankenheit
summary: Krankenheit is a first person shooter set in a dark, sci-fi world, where you play the role of a silent humanoid mutant that escaped from the laboratories of the evil scientist that held it captive.

name: Kraken Academy: End of the World Edition
summary: Pssst, hey kid! You're not gonna believe this bundle I have for sale. For you I'll make a special offer of only 10,000 Shlotinki. A once in a life time offer, trust me. Make sure to tell all your friends about Stix' Shack

name: Krezber
summary:
This is a new version of the classic arcade game Berzerk. In it you must avoid colliding with the walls, eliminate the enemies and leave the screen before Evil Otto appears and chases you.

This version has three game modes:

Original endless: It is an infinite mode, in which you must advance screens eliminating enemies.

New mode endless: It is an infinite mode, in which you must advance screens eliminating enemies you can use powerups.

New mode arcade : You must find the exit in each of the levels, you can use powerups an map.

name: Kromasphere
summary:
Kromasphere is a platforming adventure game developed by CMC Games where you control the Ninja and you have to collect color orbs in order to progress through the level. Each orb adds a new platform that allows you to reach previously unreachable locations. 
 
There are 8 worlds that need color restored to them, and each world brings a new theme and set of enemies. The levels are long, and exploration is a must.

name: Krai Mira
summary:
Scorched by the sun and hopelessly irradiated, the Earth is soaked in toxic waste and blood of its former masters. Those who remain are fighting to survive the endless and senseless struggle with the environment, and, inevitably, with themselves.

Krai Mira is a new Post-Apocalyptic RPG inspired by Fallout.

name: KrankShot!
summary: A no-stick arcade shooter for the Playdate where every shot counts. It's a crank-operated twist on the twin stick formula, where dexterity and precision are the key to success and no two runs are the same.

name: Kriaturaz: Guardian of Legends
summary: Kriaturaz: Guardian of Legends is a game that presents Brazilian myths and legends in an unprecedented way and features characters that are part of a new concept of Brazilian legends, myths, and folklore, based on research carried out over more than five months and made up of more than 300 Brazilian legends.

name: Kross
summary: Kross is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a girl named Zugaikotsuki. She's asleep from the start and the objective is to explore the dream world and collect effects.

name: Krampus: Night of Horror
summary: Survive the longest night of your life in a haunted 18th-century orphanage where Christmas becomes a living nightmare. Krampus is hunting you, and only the power of sacred holy gloves will keep you alive.

name: Krack The Hack
summary:
Krack the Hack is a short 14-exit hack where you play as a recently-transformed Koopa who is tasked to collect keys to save the Rixzo Army from the evil clutches of Bowser. Each stage has at least 4 keys required to beat the stages, with a twist in each level to make them all a new experience. The game starts easy, and then quickly ramps up in difficulty from beginning to end, to post-end. Each stage contains a moon to find, and something else as well.

Can you get through all 14 stages and find all the secrets?

name: Kromaia Ω
summary:
Take revenge on ancient gods and reveal the ultimate truth in this 360˚ free-roaming shoot-‘em up game.

Kromaia Ω is a highly-immersive shmup; a journey that is quite unlike any other that mixes technology and myth for an innovative gameplay experience. Players will explore new worlds protected by giant god-like guardians, filled with ancient temple ruins, and littered with puzzles to solve and treasures to collect.

name: Kropki 8
summary: Kropki 8 is an abstract strategy game, played by two or more people. The game is superficially similar to Go, in that the goal is to "capture" enemy dots by surrounding them with a continuous line of one's own dots. Once an area containing enemy dots is surrounded, that area ceases to be playable.

name: Kraven Manor
summary:
Kraven Manor challenges you to explore an expansive manor and discover the mysteries that lurk in its dark corners. You have the power to dynamically alter the layout of your environment by interacting with a miniature scale model of the manor, located in its extravagant entryway.

Dynamically build the manor around you. Find miniature room models and carry them back to an increasingly elaborate scale model of the manor. Adjusting the model causes rooms to move and appear in real space, awaiting your arrival.

Each new room exposes revelations into the troubling past of William Kraven. Face your fears and see if you have what it takes...the doors of Kraven Manor await you.

name: Kreedz Climbing
summary: Kreedz Climbing is the ultimate non-violent 3D platformer. Race against time and other players...or not and just relax on a server and watch others as they compete with the best to become a legend on the scene!

name: Krzosek W Krainie Czarów
summary: A fascinating role-playing game set in the village of Żabieniec. Korzon and his dog, Krzosek, have to face adversity and return home. To have equipment, you will have to either fight for it or buy it. Explore the open world and admire original graphics. Lots of weapons and armor, Easter eggs and much more on February 6, 2021.

name: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross
summary: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross, a deck strategy game, is the fantastic adventure story of against with Teutonic Knights on the run across Europe at the dawn of Medieval period, which also includes diverse decks, random plots, ups and downs story.

name: Kritter: Defend Together
summary: Kritter is NOT a tower defense. It’s NOT an action roguelite either. It’s somewhere in between. All we know is you can become absurdly powerful, blow stuff up with your friends, up to 4 players, online or local and follow a surprisingly cool story.

name: Kraken Attack
summary:
The Krakken has risen from the depths of the lake to wreak havoc! Help Ben send it back to where it came from!

Fire at the Krakken to wear down its energy, sending it back to the depths of the lake, before time runs out. Aim for the Krakken's chest for maximum damage. Watch out for the Krakken's fire especially the blue plasma bursts. Shoot them before they land in your path.

name: Kriss' Journey
summary: A science-fantasy retro-flavoured textual adventure running in your terminal

name: Kraino Origins
summary: Ghouls, ghost & plenty of hidden wall meat. In Kraino Origns you'll explore 8 levels of unadulterated retro platformer action! With ghoulish enemies, powerful weapons, hidden secrets, and a boss ready to wipe the floor with you!

name: Krakout challenge
summary: Welcome to the ultimate Challenge! Take the challenge, test your skill and nerve! Go through levels and break all barriers on your way.

name: Kryptoria
summary: Kryptoria is an immersive 4X and RTS game enabled by the Ethereum blockchain, that encourages players to build an empire in the world of Kryptoria, through economic, technological and military power.

name: Kreton La Resistance
summary: Save the Moles from prison and escape from the 19th century!

name: Krusty's Fun House
summary: Krusty the Clown's Fun House has been overrun by rats. You must help him to herd the rats into trap machines to clear them out. In order to do so, Krusty must manipulate his environment to set up pathways so that the rats are headed in the right direction. Objects that Krusty move around include blocks, fans, and pipe pieces.

name: Kraino ReAnimated
summary: Nine levels of Hi-Bit action platforming with juicy melee combat, magical abilities, epic boss battles, and secrets hidden throughout.

name: Krai. Digital-Poetry Vol. 1
summary: Krai. Digital-Poetry Vol. 1 is the first collection of 5 digital-poetry Krai games created by variously gone-mad poets.

name: Kronos
summary: All units, heed my orders! The enemy is approaching! Call for reinforcements! Set up turrets! And someone bring me a new gun! And quickly! Now, all fighters, time is short, everyone to Kronos! Go, go, go!

name: Krum: Edge of Darkness
summary:
It is a fun, hack and slash RPG game, аn action adventure with advanced combat tactics.
You will face countless fearsome mobs and grotesque beasts, hidden deadly traps, powerful demon knights and dragons.

name: Krimson
summary: Krimson is a challenging gritty rhythm platformer featuring heavy electronic metal music. You're an unknown spawn moving through a hellish world as it shifts rhythmically to the music. One wrong move means death but the checkpoints are often, and death is very short.

name: Krax Ca-caw's Concoction Chaos
summary: You are Krax Ca-caw’s new intern. Learn the craft of potion brewery, memorise the recipes, and become the next best potion maker. Fill the cauldron with the correct ingredients and stir. Don’t let it overflow!

name: Kraken City
summary: She is the dark magician, an apostle of the great Kraken, Nialato. Show the foolish mortals the terrifying power of the Kraken through brute strength and magical prowess Experience the thrill of hack-and-slash action alongside the fearsome Kraken

name: Kritika: Zero
summary: Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding world of Kritika: Zero, a dynamic online multiplayer game that combines lightning-fast combat, stunning visuals, and an ever-expanding universe. Choose your hero from diverse classes and customize your character to stand out in this action-packed realm.

name: Krispain Hero
summary: What can go through a former warrior’s head upon seeing an incomprehensible portal in the middle of the road? It is to go through the portal, of course, to explore an alternative past, where the world is definitely not ruled by people.

name: Kra-Ken
summary: Fight in intense, 1-on-1 battles with your friends! Kra-Ken is a 2.5D fighting game that will make you grip your controller ever more tightly as you beat your opponent.

name: Kraken Smash: Volleyball
summary: Squids play volleyball! Smash the ball in your friend's face and start a fight with them that will last at least for the 10 generations to come. You can play with up to 4 players, which means you can lose 3 friends at the same time.

name: Kredolis
summary: The fall of Atlantis has left a small island unsunken and a mysterious institute has taken hold. You have shipwrecked and found yourself lost between esoteric and mystical puzzles. Find your way home or enter the sunken lighthouse into the depths of Atlantis.

name: Krautscape
summary: Krautscape is an action-packed racing game with bird-like flying cars, focused on competitive multiplayer gameplay. The leading player actively builds the racetrack while the chasing players can take shortcuts by flying off the track to overcome obstacles. But the track is needed to score and to get speed – the vehicles don't have any thrusters to accelerate while flying. The three multiplayer game modes are designed to support nonlinear gameplay and intelligent movement instead of forcing you to drive perfectly.

name: KrvVR
summary: A fast-paced martial arts VR game where you battle enemies in stunning spiritual locations. Wield weapons, exploit abilities and burn calories through intense physical exercise.

name: Krampus Kills
summary: In this Home Alone meets Doom fright fest, fight off Krampus on Christmas Eve, in a terrifying, double-barrel wielding, jump-scaring, thrill ride!

name: Kraken Odyssey
summary: Little kraken in danger! Dive into this 3D action game and avoid dangers. Explore worlds like beaches, jungles, mountains, dungeons. Unlock costumes, be a pirate or unicorn. Love octopuses, beach, adventure? Play Kraken Odyssey!

name: Krakout
summary:
Arkanoid-style Breakout clone, which unlike most other similar games has the bat on the side of the screen (there is a left/right option) instead of at the bottom.

There are a number of types of special bricks, but unlike e.g. Arkanoid, they do not fall towards the bat. Instead, when you hit a special brick, it flips to show a letter. E.g. E (Extend bat), C (Catch ball), M (Missile), B (Bomb, explodes when hit by ball, clearing a number of bricks) and X (Extra life).

The enemies/obstacles are more varied than in Arkanoid. Some make the bat freeze, some actually chew and eat your ball and spit out the core back at you!

name: Kraken Academy!!
summary: Make friends, free spirits and make sure that the world doesn’t end! Welcome to Kraken Academy, a technicolor fever dream that for legal reasons can only be described as "technically a school." Join forces with a magical kraken to manipulate a time loop and save the world.

name: Krampus is Home
summary: Krampus is Home is a chilling first-person survival horror experience inspired by Central European folklore. You’ll step into the shoes of Sebastian, a teenager left home alone on Christmas Eve, only to be hunted by Krampus and his sinister helpers. With intense stealth mechanics, survival strategies, and action-packed gameplay, you’ll need to evade Krampus’s grasp and fight for your survival. Uncover the dark mystery behind your abduction and find a way to escape from Krampus’s realm.

name: Kristala
summary:
Kristala is a dark fantasy ARPG featuring Sekiro-inspired combat, acrobatic parkour, and exploration to uncover a detailed story. Embark on a journey to join ranks with Ailur’s most elite warriors as you battle to master the ancient magic of the Sacred Six and uncover the source of a dark curse.

Play as a catlike warrior from one of six clans, each with its own unique magic specialty. Choose your own style of combat: avoid damage by blocking, dashing/rolling, and deflecting attacks; combo light and heavy attacks; utilize multiple weapon abilities; and cast numerous spells.

Your catlike character will be fully customizable via various Talent Trees, including an innovative Feline Skill tree that allows you to unlock and level a multitude of feline-related skills.

name: Krosmaster Arena
summary: Take on the biggest bosses in the Krosmoz in an adventure mode filled with unique challenges, battle players from all over the world in the PvP Arenas in this tactical board game, a mixture of strategy and epic battle with eye-popping animation and black humor.

name: Krunker
summary: Shoot your way through 23 rotation maps to earn rewards for your efforts! Master the highly skill-based slidehop movement system unique to Krunker. If dropping nukes and quick-scoping people in pubs isn't your thing, Krunker also offers thousands of custom games to choose from which includes Infected, parkour, free for all, capture the flag and much much more. With Krunker's robust modding and mapping tools there are no limits to what you can create and experience.

name: Krypt
summary: Krypt is an old-school text adventure filled with excitement and peril. Fight monsters, make choices, and travel through forests and mountains to defeat the evil King Krypt in this epic fantasy tale. But watch out as you try to discover all the paths, because not every choice ends in victory.

name: Kromaia
summary: The frantic old-school action of classic coin-op shoot-‘em-ups comes crashing headlong into the 21st century. Explosive high-octane blasting combines with hordes of enemies in a 360˚ environment – fly, spin and shoot anywhere and everywhere!

name: Krystopia: A Puzzle Journey
summary: Follow Nova Dune, a space explorer in her quest to find out about the unfamiliar distress signal she received aboard her ship. Determined to investigate it, she finds herself on a desolated planet where all civilization has vanished.

name: Krosmaga
summary: Kosmaga is a game of skill where the Twelve Gods of the Krosmoz universe settle their differences by pitting creatures, mortals, and demi-gods against each other in a battle of truly epic proportions!

name: Krater: Shadows over Solside
summary:
Krater is a real-time squad based dungeon crawling game. The game combines fast paced combat, tactical squad management, crafting, and questing all seen from a classic RTS perspective. 
 
While the game’s campaign can be played offline, the Co-Op expansion adds the opportunity to tackle hours of specially designed online Co-Op dungeons and bosses. 
 
The game brings you far into the future of a post-apocalyptic Sweden. Once home to IKEA, Vikings, and Minecraft, today its primitive inhabitants scavenge the broken overgrown world for technological artifacts.

name: Kryptonite: Flamez Hedgehog
summary: Published in 2003, Kryptonite: Flamez Hedgehog was a fangame based on the Sonic the Hedgehog series.

name: Krusty Krab Nightmare
summary: The real nightmare is already here!

name: Kraden's Crypt
summary: Kraden's Crypt is a multiplayer momentum driven rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: Krazy Kong
summary: Krazy Kong is a Donkey Kong clone for Vic 20

name: Krolewna Sniezka
summary: Snow White and seven dwarfs welcome to an amazingly funny and exciting game! All children will enjoy truly funny rhymes and puzzles in the Magic Mirror quiz, search for treasures in the mine, creating your own seven dwarfs, a funny colouring game and many more amazing games! You will be able to test your reflexes during Sweet Marmalading, show off your good memory and observation skills as well as artistic skills in composing your own songs! You can also conjure up a special elixir the effects of which will be truly surprising! First of all, the child will be introduced to the wonderful world of fairy tales and will experience unforgettable adventures!

name: Krakels ABC: Stava
summary: Educational game for kids to learn spelling.

name: Krazy Kobra
summary: It's the classic game of Snake, except released back when it was still fairly new. This version however is an extreme challenge with 50 custom-designed levels to rival the mighty Snake Byte.

name: KrissX
summary: Word puzzle game

name: Kronos: Wisdom Trials
summary: Can you solve the hardest puzzles in the Wisdom Trials?

name: Kritika Sea Online
summary: Kritika is an pvp based MMORPG

name: Krew Eats
summary: Krew Eats is a clicker mobile game developed by BBTV Interactive for the YouTube channel ItsFunneh, and the YouTube Gaming group The Krew.

name: Krystal the Adventurer
summary: Krystal's home has been burned down by a magic sword sent by a wizard, and it's up to you to help her beat him up!

name: Krull
summary: Tied in with the movie "Krull". Playing Prince Colwyn, you must survive five events which repeat after completion. Increasing difficulty. It uses a dual joystick control panel.

name: Kritika Global
summary: Kritika Global is a hyper-stylized, anime brawler game featuring over-the-top action with giant blades, superguns, and dazzling acrobatics. Fight with friends or rampage solo through hordes of enemies and super-sized bosses in an epic fantasy world.

name: Krazy Bowl
summary: A bowling game with two modes of play: regular and Krazy Bowl. The latter is bowling with various pins missing and is harder.

name: Kristallijn
summary: Explore an abandoned club intermittently lit by strobe lights and try to follow in the footsteps of a strange dancer. A short first-person audio-visual experience.

name: Kranker
summary: Kranker is an idle/incremental game for the playdate.

name: Krampen
summary: Krampen is a horror-adventure game in which you will immerse yourself in a winter forest and help a lost soul regain a piece of itself. Uncover all the secrets that go beyond the gaming experience and discover the truth about the main character!

name: Krog Wars
summary: An action game in the style of Space Invaders with both 2D and 3D modes.

name: Kris Kringle's Christmas Village VR
summary: Get into the spirit of Christmas with this festive holiday VR experience. Play wintery carnival activities- Holi-Darts, Ski-Ball, Reindeer Basketball and the Blizzard Blaster Gallery!

name: K-Razy Shoot-Out
summary:
K-Razy Shoot-Out is a clone of the arcade game Berzerk developed by K-Byte, a division of Kay Enterprises, and released for the Atari 8-bit family in 1981. The game was written by Torre Meeder and Dr. Keith Dreyer. An Atari 5200 version followed in 1983.

The game is part of a series of titles with the "K-" prefix, including K-Razy Kritters and K-Star Patrol. All of them were published on cartridge. The K-Byte games were later published by CBS Software, including the Atari 5200 port of K-Razy Shoot-Out]

name: Kraino Rebirth
summary:
Sharpen thy scythe & lock n’ load! for you are about to enter a vast world of monsters, magic & mayhem!

Kraino is once again called into action! with his deadly scythe & hand-cannon

Cut & blast your way through a meticulously hand-crafted non-linear world filled with hazards, Ghoulies & ghosts! Gain powerful abilities to reach the unknown.

The world is vast & filled with more than just enemies, Along your journey you’ll encounter some friendly faces some of which might aid you (for a price)

name: Krampus Quest
summary: Krampus Quest is a back-to-basics retro-style action-platformer with a christmas theme. Fighting your way up the North Pole, absorbing souls, dodging traps and pitfalls, and upgrading abilities, to in the end battle Santa Claus himself.

name: Kristal Mağara
summary: A short platform game collect all the crystals and go to the next level game consists of 5 levels in total.

name: Kriegsfront Battlescaper
summary: Create mechs and battlefield dioramas using built-in photo mode, mecha builder, and level editor. Based on developer tools for our upcoming mecha turn-based tactics game, Kriegsfront Tactics.

name: Kronostasis
summary: A fast paced FPS featuring a time trial based scoreboard. The plot follows a sci-fi/fantasy hybrid story where a time-worn sorcerer boards a mining spacecraft. Crewmembers are being turned into creatures of ancient myth and you, a security robot, must now face these mysterious horrors.

name: krAsAvA Shot
summary: 2079 planet Earth. Together with the spacecraft conducting the expedition on Mars, the earth gets an unknown virus. Almost the entire population of the planet exposed to infection and mutated into zombies.

name: Kris Kross: Make My Video
summary:
Make My Video: Kris Kross is a video game based on real-time editing of music video footage. The setup is that a radio DJ is taking calls from listeners who want to see custom videos for their favorite Kris Kross videos. The specifications normally come in the form of a set of pictures they either do or don't want to see, and perhaps some effects. The game has three Kris Kross videos from which to choose: "Jump", "Warm It Up", and "I Missed The Bus".

After receiving the video specifications, the player enters the video editing console in the EditChallenge mode. From this console, the player can view and select between 3 video streams that are playing. The selected stream will be edited into the final video. One stream is the original video while the other 2 feature assorted random footage that nonetheless often carries images that happened to have been specified in the video request. The video editing console also allows the player to apply a variety of real-time filters, such as mosaic and blur filters, RGB color filters, strobe and motion filters, lyric subtitles, among others.

name: Krabat: The Secret of the Sorbian King
summary:
"Krabat" is a classic point-and-click adventure game about the famous Sorbian fairy-tale figure Krabat.
Adventure scenes drawn by hand which take you to historic events and places such as Moritzburg Castle near Dresden, or to Bautzen.
Authentic Sorbian voice recordings and optional subtitles in English, German, Lower and Upper Sorbian.

name: Krystal Kart AR
summary:
Experience the thrill of drifting through fast looping tracks and immerse yourself in the wonders of AR as you race into a new reality. 
 
Set in a remote area of the galaxy, you are challenged to beat the competition to the finish line. Krystal Kart features stylized visuals, fun physics, and fast drift based racing.

name: Krieg im Weltraum
summary: With this cartridge you become the captain of a space cruiser that combats enemy spaceships and docks at a space station. The program can be played alone or with one opponent.

name: Krypton Egg
summary:
With Krypton Egg you will get back to the pleasures of a good breakout. The objective remains the same: destroy all the bricks of the level using only one ball in order to go to the next level.

You can go up to the 72nd level proposed by this game, but before that, you will have to prepare yourself in order to become the perfect shooter. Above all, do not be scared if dozens of balls are coming up at the same time, up to then everything seems fine. Calm and self-control are the necessary qualities to play this game.

Thanks to its wonderful colors, special effects, but also its dynamic musics, Krypton Egg will seduce all the breakout lovers but also delight all gamers which are looking for the ultimate breakout adventure.

name: Krim: The Music Bot
summary: KTMB is a hardcore 2D platformer with puzzle elements, where you take on the role of Krim - the Musical Bot.

name: Krim: The War in the Crimea 1941-42
summary: KRIM: The War in the Crimea 1941-42 is an operational/strategic simulation of the German 11th Army’s operations in the Crimean Peninsula from late October 1941 through 4 July 1942.

name: K-Razy Kritters
summary: Space Invaders/Galaxian clone

name: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross - Shining Stars
summary: Shining Stars: A free world mode that combines vast map exploration, city-building development, and guild upgrades. Venture into various realms to write a new chapter of history!

name: Kriegsland
summary:
Kriegsland, or Kriegsland: Blutordnung, is a Doom total conversion mod created by GAA1992 and YukesVonFaust inspired by the Wolfenstein franchise, especially The New Order, that adapts and brings its elements to the other id Software's classic FPS.

This PWAD features a completely new arsenal, monsters (including their behavior), HUD, ammo, items, and power-ups sprites. The game's screens, sounds, and gameplay elements were also added or modified, like separated keys for both grenades and the quick melee attack and the possibility of dual-wielding most of the weapons. It also features a good amount of difficulty, blood, and gibbing system.

name: Kronorite
summary: Build during the building time so you can stay alive and fight during the combat time. Make killstreaks to get powerups to make EVEN MORE KILLSTREAKS FOR EVEN MORE POWERUPS!!! Kill as much as you can while staying alive for as long as you can to advance as much as possible.

name: Kryzta
summary: Kryzta is an experimental action game by Cactus. On the surface, it looks like an arena shooter, but you are unable to fire. Instead, the focus is on avoiding enemy shots and maneuvering in such a way that the enemy hit each other, instead of you.

name: Krampen
summary: Immerse yourself in the winter forest and help a lost soul to find a piece of itself. What is awaiting you there.. or who?

name: Kryp
summary: ONE BUTTON LOCAL MULTIPLAYER SHOOTER

name: KrabbitWorld Origins
summary: The latest Action/RPG/Fighter by independent studio KrabbitSoft featuring 6 playable/customizable Krabbits, (2 male, 4 female), 5 henchmen, Story Mode, 4 Battle Modes, Battle Theatres, quests, roaming mobs and great camera and character controls. No grind, loot aplenty and quick map travel.

name: Kryftolike
summary: Explore an infinite maze looking for treasure and hiding from monsters

name: Kraken
summary: Take control of the mighty Kraken and wreak havoc on the seven seas! Plunge to the depths of your humanity as you smash through history’s greatest nautical empires.

name: Kraktures
summary: Collect, and fight powerful creatures known as Kraktures in turn-based or realtime RPG battles.

name: Kroll
summary: A side-scrolling beat 'em up from Digital Legends hits the iPhone.

name: Kronos: Time Titan
summary: In this 2D combat platformer, embark on a quest to confront the God of the Sky as you navigate the dangers of Mount Olympus in order to reclaim your rightful place as king.

name: KreisReise
summary: This game is the Metroidvania action game. It is 2D map, but, with a characteristic rotary view, the screen scrolls and turns. You get weapons and actions by exploration, and let's conquer the tower.

name: Kring
summary: KRING is an hand-made / random-designed / indie-god-clicker game where you'll need to dominate the most stupid breed of the whole universe: the KRING! Do it through 8 (or 10?) different games, which tell to the universe the story of the loser gods who defeated (maybe) the SuperLegendary Gods!

name: Krimzon hoard
summary: Experience a frenetically paced wave based hoard game, Play the one room challenge mode to learn the gun skills and surviving to high rounds and then Explore and find your way through the multiple levels of the campaign.

name: Krusty Zombies
summary: A zombie survival game in the Spongebob universe

name: Krashlander
summary: Krashlander is a physics powered game that will have you blasting down large mountain slopes and soaring over gaping crevices to attack the evil robots that destroyed your world.

name: Kraino
summary: Kraino is a retro-styled 2D action-platformer, inspired by awesome classics of the 8 / 16 bit era; Castlevania, Metroid, and Mega Man. Fight your way through 6 levels with hidden areas to find.

name: Krampusnacht
summary:
Krampusnacht is an 8-bit tile-based Christmas horror game. 
 
⏰ Lasts 20 to 30 minutes! 
 
It's the night of December 5th. Tomorrow is the Feast of St. Nicholas, when children are given all sorts of gifts... if they make it through the night. 
 
If you've been naughty, you will meet your doom at the hands of Krampus, an ancient demon who punishes evildoers once every year.

name: KRTL: Jay Und Die Spielzeugdiebe
summary: KRTL: Jay und die Spielzeugdiebe is an Action game, developed by Eclipse Entertainment and published by THQ, which was released in Europe in 2000.

name: Krazy Kart Racing
summary: The sequel to Konami's Game Boy Advance kart racer, Krazy Kart Racing includes many of Konami's well-known characters from a variety of franchises, including Goemon, Dracula, and Pyramid Head.

name: Krum: Battle Arena
summary: On the arena rules are simple - bring your name and your country in front of everybody else! It is a fun, competitive, asynchronous, hack and slash, parody game.

name: Kraken's Curse
summary: A rogue-like pirate adventure game. Explore a skeleton-riddled archipelago in search of a giant monster. Find treasures, weapons and secrets. Can you defeat the terrible kraken?

name: Krashimals
summary: Krashimals is a chaotic, physics-driven party game where you play as adorable animals and crash into friends for ultimate mayhem! Smash through stylized arenas, challenge modes, use power-ups, and enjoy the fun. Customize your Krashimals hats, karts and wheels and battle to be the last one standing!

name: Krispain Hero VR: Roguelite Dungeon Shooter Simulator
Kronolog: The Nazi Paradox
summary: Kronolog: The Nazi Paradox is an Adventure game, developed by Castleworks Gameware and published by Merit Software, which was released in 1993.

name: Krazy Kreatures
summary: Here they come. And there they go. They just keep coming, you gotta make 'em go away. When you signed on as an intergalactic immigration officer you figured it was an easy way to make some money. You were wrong. Transporting wave after wave of weird wild life from all over the universe is anything but easy. You gotta line 'em up to move 'em out. Up and down, left and right, or diagonally you gotta make the clumps of critters move out faster than they move in. If the room fills to capacity, that's it, the entire system will be shut down. One of the most exciting games of the year, it's more fun than a barrel full of creatures!

name: Kraft & Slash
summary: Craft your weapon and fight!

name: Kronos
summary: A unique Action RPG game with lots of combats, item customization and puzzle solving.

name: Krila
summary: What is the novel about? Everything is very simple! About the girl Marie, who is stuck in a traumatic situation. The girl's psyche tries to protect itself from even more trauma by escaping from reality. Where will it lead her? Will she be able to adapt to a new place - in an orphanage - and solve all its secrets?

name: Kratoria
summary: Kratoria is an upcoming RTS/City-Building Game with RPG and Roguelike Elements, set in the world of Antiquity.

name: Krew.io
summary:
Krew.io is a unique multiplayer 3D third-person shooter web-based game. Included within the io games category, but vastly different compared to most of its competition, Krew boasts an overall pirate theme where players compete to sink each other, race for loot, and attempt to be a successful pirate.

The game is mostly competitive, as players battle each other for #1 on the in-game leaderboard, but is also somewhat cooperative, as players on the same ship will have to work together to sink enemies and pilot the craft.

name: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross - Character Pack (Western Style)
summary: Krzyżacy - The Knights of the Cross：Character Pack (Western Style) can replace the portraits and avatars of each character image in the game with one click

name: Krampus
summary: You play as a teenager, who along with his family went to a country house to celebrate Christmas. But in the festive night something went wrong.

name: Kromer Kollector
summary: Game starring Spamton from DELTARUNE Chapter 2

name: Kryptic
summary: This puzzle game filled with codes and ciphers will test your logical thinking and reasoning. Don't worry if you're having some difficulty, there's a hint system included for those who have difficulty, and there are 7 included cipher tools to make things easier.

name: Krazy Ace Miniature Golf
summary: Krazy Ace Miniature Golf is a miniature golf game for one to four players. You must hit the golf ball into the hole in the fewest shots while avoiding obstacles and traps. Try to get a better score than your opponent(s) or at least get within the number of shots per hole (par).

name: Krakout Unlimited
summary: Krakout Unlimited is a remake of Gremlin's popular game Krakout which itself was an Arkanoid-style Breakout clone.

name: KRYPTON.9
summary: Play chemistry. Even if you don’t...

name: Kreed
summary: In the year 2944 humanity is still at war with the Tiglaary and a strange anomaly named Kreed gives the scientists riddles they can't solve. Some religious groups believe the Kreed is a higher being and many of them try to enter it. One day they finally succeed and under the command of Teofrast Rumi, a high ranking officer, a ship full of fanatics makes his way into the anomaly. As a soldier of the legion, you and your colleagues aboard the spaceship Aspero are sent after him.

name: Krotruvink
summary:
This story is about a single person who was unsure of the nature of things and the physical integrity of things around him.
Everyday this man went to his job and dreamed of a time in which, it seems, he didn't exist.
But then one day after our protagonist took the bus to work, he got off on...a ship.

name: Kraken Attack!
summary: Wreak havoc as the mighty Kraken! Crush cities, swat pesky choppers, and unleash your tentacled fury in this fast-paced arcade smash-fest. Can you handle the chaos?

name: Krystopia: Nova's Journey
summary: Embodying space explorer Nova Dune, the player needs to observe the environment and navigate in a typical point and click-fashion to solve puzzles and progress through the game.

name: Kram
summary: Collect items while avoiding deadly skulls.

name: Kryxivia
summary:
Kryxivia is a fantasy 3D MMORPG game directly available on our website at kryxivia.io, a whole eco-system awaiting new adventurous players to collect Kryxit! In our world, prepare yourself to earn crypto-currency and unique rare NFT while having a fun and cooperative experience with your friends.

You can build your own character, fight in dungeons against bosses, stake your currency in the bank, loot from farming special items, cast spells contained from magical gems named Kryxit that can be linked to your items for accessibility.

name: Kronian Titans
summary: 2.5D Airdasher fighting game with mechs! Boost everywhere while keeping an eye on your energy and fuel, and use varied and complex weapons to snatch victory! Then control a squad of mechs in story mode to get through the conflict around Saturn and experience the characters in a new light!

name: Kritika: Reboot
summary: Kritika: Reboot is a hyper-stylized, anime brawler game featuring over-the-top action with giant blades, superguns, and dazzling acrobatics. Fight with friends or rampage solo through hordes of enemies and super-sized bosses in an epic fantasy world.

name: Kromaticube
summary: KROMATICUBE is a minimalist arcade game where you have to avoid obstacles and listenning to chiptune musics. Just keep alive for at least 60 seconds to complete a level. Easy right ? Maybe not.

name: Kriophobia
summary: You are Anna, a lonesome geophysicist trapped in a military base in the depths of a mysterious Russian island, where the cold is deadly. Hauntings beyond her comprehension inhabits under the snow, and they conceal a disturbing past in which she has to unveil in order to survive.

name: Krebswelte
summary: Krebswelte is a game, created as an entry into TIGSource's "Procedural Generation" competition. The player controls a mercenary who, on each level, must find a key and make his way to the exit. Each level is a random, chaotic assortment of squares; the mercenary can move around thanks to his incredible jumping abilities, and his gun which allows him to destroy walls. A gun has unlimited ammo, but it takes a while to reload when its clip runs out. Destroyed wall sections re-appear after a while.

name: Krypta FM
summary: Can you solve the mystery of the Beast of Gozdary?

name: Kreeps
summary: Kreeps is a tower defense game where you choose how your towers and the enemies scale as the game progresses. Use any combination of 7 different types of towers and weapons to defend against the growing Kreep horde.

name: Kromlech
summary: Embark on a journey in this dark fantasy action-adventure game to find out why the tapestry of the world is suddenly unraveling itself and even the gods themselves seem powerless to stop it. Sharpen your blade, gather your companions, and prepare to make the last stand as the world around you burns.

name: Krakels ABC: Läsa
summary: Educational game for learning reading.

name: Krusenstern: A Stellar Sail
summary: This is a monumental immersive project that tells the story of Russia’s first circumnavigation by captains Krusenshtern and Lisyansky on board Nadezhda and Neva. Walk in captain’s shoes, recruit a ship crew, secure the Emperor’s backing and sail out on a history-altering journey.

name: Kram Keep
summary: Explore the castle, shoot enemies, and collect new abilities! How much can I possibly cram into a single screen?

name: Kromaia: Annvrsary X
summary: Experience the explosive VR remaster of Kromaia, celebrating its tenth anniversary! Immerse yourself in frantic old-school action, high-octane blasting, and a 360˚ environment. Unleash your firepower anywhere and everywhere in this groundbreaking VR adventure!

name: Krazy Ivan
summary: It is the year 2018. Devastating energy shields have appeared in five different places on the earth and are spreading at an incredible rate. There is only one solution: combat the enemy from within and destroy them. Only one machine is powerful enough: a 40ft high Robot. Only one man is crazy enough to operate it. His name: Krazy Ivan.

name: Krakels ABC: Storm Över Allemansland
summary: In this game you play a game for every letter, then you ring the bell to wake the letter up.

name: Krosfighter
summary: Who will be the last one standing? Choose your hero from a wide range of universes and play with friends in this party shooter packed with colorful graphics and rogue-like features. It's just plain fun, online or locally, for two to four players.

name: Krieg
summary:
Built from the ground up for VR, Krieg is a team-based fantasy multiplayer competitive game. 
Thrown into the middle of a war between The King's Army and The Ancients, only the strongest will survive. This war of epic mercenaries and guardians will decide the fate of the realm. 
 
Artificial locomotion has the ability to bring the most competitive experience possible for VR only titles. We fully embraced this and understand this might not be for everyone. Because of this Krieg will always have a free demo so there's no risk to try it.

name: Kremlin 3D
summary:
Vladolf Putler, a psychopathic ruler of an evil empire, is disturbing the global peace again.
He has to be stopped before more lives are lost. Are you up to the task?

name: Krunch
summary: Krunch is a quick-reflex game about escaping, survival and the fear of being closed-in where you play as one of six Krons (mechanical orb-like entities) trapped in a seemingly abandoned fortress. Escape more than 100 claustrophobic levels spread across 4 zones, survive 3 challenging boss chases, conquer one frantic race to freedom! Krunch demands concentration, delivers fast gameplay and will test fans of games such as Mega Man, Super Meat Boy and VVVVVV.

name: Krystine and the children in chains
summary: Help Krystine to rescue her little brother kept prisonner into the castle of nightmare

name: Krek Da Frog
summary: Whole game is about eating butterflies. Player controls frog which can move and jump around environment. Player can eat nearby butterflies, but careful, there are some butterflies which are poisonous for frogs and after eating them, player looses one of his three lives. If player dies game is over and player must start again. In game are no time limits, game suppose to be funny and relaxing.

name: Krull
summary: Action tie-in with the movie of the same name.

name: Krakels ABC: Ordlek
summary: Educational game for learning puns.

name: Krakels ABC: Den galna dammsugaren
summary:
The crazy vacuum cleaner has sucked in all the words and language, and it is up to the player to sort out this mess and bring back the words.
The game is built upon the first game in the series and is aimed toward children that have developed further understanding of reading and writing.

name: Kronville: Stolen Dreams
summary: Kronville: Stolen Dreams is a hidden object mystery game released on PC the 31 October 2001.
